Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Ashland
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Ashland, Division, Damen and Milwaukee: due to, fire department activity near Milwaukee/Ashland.
